name: Bubble Toast
plugin_instructions:
Step-by-Step Guide:

	1. Navigate to the "Workflow" tab in your bubble.io project.

	2. Click on "Add an Event" to select the trigger that will activate the toast notification.

	3. After choosing the desired event, click on "Add an Action" to specify what should happen when the event occurs.

	4. In the action options, locate and select "Show a Toast" from the available actions.

	5. Once you've selected "Show a Toast," you can customize the content, appearance, and behavior of the toast notification according to your preferences.

	6. Optionally, you can set the background color, text color, and position of the toast notification to match your application's design.
